website_summaries.verdict: The odds of hitting an albatross may be possible with the Adicross PPF. Possessing qualities performing at par with expensive golf shoes, users are delighted that they can take their game to a whole new level without breaking the bank. At only $90, most cannot find a reason not to include it on their collection of golf shoes.
pros: Majority of those reviewing the Adidas Adicross PPF describe it as extremely comfortable
It also makes some of them feel as if playing golf in flip flops
The lugs are constructed deep enough to provide stability according to numerous consumers
The Adicross PPF delivers stability for both walking on the course and when performing a swing
Some of the consumers highly appreciate that the need to change shoes when doing errands, traveling, or playing golf is eliminated
Several wearers find that the water-resistant upper makes this Adidas golf shoe an appropriate gear for summer
cons: A tester feels bothered with the tongue slipping when walking
One complains that the sawtooth-shaped eyelets gives off a strange feeling to the foot because it has several angles

customer_reviews.title: An excellent product, very comfortable and a good grip.
customer_reviews.text: Used for golf. Some might differ! Excellent golf shoes and so comfortable. Thank-you
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Michael Browne

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality, husband is very pleased with product which fits snugly and lots of support for swing. Helps that it looks great and not like some of the other rather ugly looking golf shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cool
customer_reviews.text: Pretty happy with these, although the heel rubs a bit, it seems a bit high?
customer_reviews.author: Ben Bencraft

customer_reviews.title: Maybe go up .5 in shoe size make sure they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality usually I am a size 8 so I ordered a 8.5 perfect fit for nice weather golf
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought for son's birthday,he loves them,so comfortable,wide fit,good support at heel.Smart looking leather shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Chappell

customer_reviews.title: check the fit is uk
customer_reviews.text: the price. first wearing rubbed heel on one foot after that perfect
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable summer shoes but not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: They fit Were cheap But they leak (as do most)
customer_reviews.author: SimonGP

customer_reviews.title: Good value & comfy.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, waterproof, comfy, reasonable grip.. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Stew Hall

customer_reviews.title: Spineless golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy and look good,very good value for leather golf shoes !!
customer_reviews.author: J F Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Righty Tighty
customer_reviews.text: Left shoe perfect. Right tight...which isn't something I normally find. Maybe I'm wider than I realised. So nice shoe, nearly nice shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Ron G

customer_reviews.title: comfy
customer_reviews.text: Nice comfortable shoes. Delivered earlier than expected. Got a size higher to have a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: olayemi Balogun

customer_reviews.title: Very happy - great shoes for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes - perfect for the purpose, and more importantly water proof for the English weather.
customer_reviews.author: Shroom72

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Fitted well and comfy and handled hilly courses well and feet were less tired and seller was very helpful
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, feels like wearing slippers. Suffer from a bunion and I didn't feel it once during a round of golf
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and look great
customer_reviews.text: Only worn them around the house to break them in. Really comfy, would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Adidas Golf Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described and arrived a day earlier than forecast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Adicross Ppf Golf Shoes
product_meta.description: This golf shoe is perfect for moving from GREEN to the streets of the city. Its casual design incorporates cloudfoam and bounce technologies that offer great cushioning, comfort and versatility. Custom lacing system provides an unbeatable hold inside and outside the golf course.
